home.title: Welcome to IK | Iris Kooij
home.subtitle: Natural Beauty and Fascia Treatments
home.hero: Experience the Award Winning fascia treatment by Gantke®!
home.usp: As the only Gantke Fascia therapist in Haarlemmermeer, you can visit IK for this unprecedented treatment!
home.problem1: You want to scream, all that tension in your body.
home.problem2: One treatment after another... and you still have the feeling that nothing has been resolved.
home.problem3: It costs you so much time. Precious time that you would rather spend on the fun things in life.
home.solution: With Gantke Fascia Therapy, I guide you on your path to more freedom of movement.
home.solutionDetails: After a body structure analysis, we work, in a process, on the cause of the complaints. Step by step, being able to do the things you enjoy again.
home.cta2: Does it sound interesting and would you like to know what Gantke Fascia therapy could mean in your life? Send me an email and I will contact you as soon as possible!
home.featuresTitle: IK | Distinctive in the world of beauty care!

fascia.title: Gantke® Fascia Treatment
fascia.description: Gantke® Fascia Therapy won the Wellness Innovation Award 2017 in Germany and is specifically aimed at the deeper connective tissue throughout the body.
fascia.details: Clients with specific problems and with longer-lasting and recurring complaints particularly benefit from this treatment.
fascia.specialist: As a specialist, I am, within Haarlemmermeer, the only therapist/teacher who offers this special and unique Award Winning fascia treatment.
fascia.training: I completed my training at Gantke® Akademie für Ganzheitliche Körperarbeit in Dortmund, Germany and am licensed as a partner and teacher to perform the treatment within my practice.

facial.title: Facial Treatments
facial.intro: A feeling of Wellness, a moment for yourself and being kind to yourself and your skin?
facial.description: Experience the facial treatment at Iris Kooij. All facial treatments with natural and high-quality products from Pharmos Natur and with the Fresh Organic Aloe Vera Leaf.
facial.pharmos: Pharmos Natur is a 100% natural Cosmetics product
facial.treatment3: Luxury Pharmos Natur Rohini Treatment 120 min
